snippet.title: nelward x HiP CoLouR - Amber Island
snippet.description:
This is part of HiP CoLouR's excellent new EP, "A Long, Long Time Ago..."

Spotify link: https://open.spotify.com/album/5ZqpBPaCGXOA3G0ELV4QOP?si=hwBwHiuUSKG37yEynPwwoA

HiP CoLouR's Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4sZm9km9S1lHKlwgxATOEg

HiP CoLouR's instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hip_colour/channel/

The "song" was written by me in 2018, vocals and guitar solo by me. HiP CoLouR played piano on it, arranged it, provided additional vocals and bass. Also mixed it.

LYRICS

through my windowpane
i can see your garden
and is pans a million miles on the horizon

through each passing frame
there’s a thousand paintings
and we’re dancing on the canvas we’re creating

through my windowpane
effervescent showers
soon the hummingbirds surround the budding flowers

after pouring rain
there’s a bluebird waiting
and each sight and sound is endless and amazing

I see bright red kites in the distance
a new song playing in my mind
the beat gets loud as I listen
Through windowpanes watching all my world come to lifeThere’s a bright red kite in the distance
a new song playing in my mind
the beat gets loud as I listen
Through windowpanes
Back to the place where I sang la la -a -a
Amber Island, amber islandtake me back to the times where I sang na na -a -a
Amber Island, amber island

Take me back to to the place where I sang la la -a -a
Amber Island, Amber island
take me back to the times where I sang na na -a -a
Amber Island, amber island
